title: Recall the Range Formula
text: The range of a set of numbers is the difference between the largest and smallest values.

title: Identify the Maximum Data Value
text: The MAX() function would return the maximum value of a column.

title: Identify the Minimum Data Value
text: What MIN() function would return the minimum value of a column.

title: Understanding SQL Aggregate Functions
text: SQL includes several aggregate functions such as MIN(), MAX(), SUM(), AVG(), and COUNT(). These help in summarizing large volumes of data.
